overview: Using aphrodisiacs as a secret weapon, a swimmer gets an entire gym full of folks to fuck. A tale of olympic hopefulls, with Phil Bradley as coach, wrestlers, Scott Randsome, and Derek Cruise can only supress their pent-up desires for so long. But when Phil leaves the room Scott and Derek take the holds to a sweatysexual release, Phil is not left out when he enters the room in the midst of the heat. Jim Reeves and Paul Carrigan opt for a sweaty roll in the hay after their workout. It was a hot day. Beefy, Duncan Starr whips out his huge 'ten incher' and strokes it for us celebrating his gold medal day.
title: The Olympians
